data.name: lGallery.Tooltip
data.value:
Clicking on the magnifying glass and we'll return any public albums you can display.

If you'd like to show private albums, you can click on the lock icon and authorize this module access to your flickr/picasa private items.

data.name: lUsername.Tooltip.flickr
data.value:
Need Help Locating your Flickr UserID?

You can use www.idgettr.com to lookup your Flickr userid, this userid is required to connect to your Flickr account

data.name: lUsername.Tooltip.picasa
data.value:
Need Help Locating your Picasa Username?

Your Picasa username is your Google Account. If you use gmail, it is the text to the left of "@gmail.com", if you're using hosted gmail it will be your full email address.

data.name: tSlideShowSpeed.Help
data.value: The transition duration between slides in seconds
